amendment.description: To simplify the process for admitting temporary alien agricultural workers under section 101(a)(15)(H)(ii)(a) of the Immigration and Nationality Act, to increase access to such workers, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 432 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Chambliss.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 432 presented in Senate.
Cloture not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 21 - 77. Record Vote Number: 97.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 432 that the amendment is non-germane.
Amendment SA 432 ruled non-germane by the chair.
